author: hwright
msg: Fix the JavaHL build by accounting for changes in the underlying status
structure.  This change does not push those changes through to the Java layer;
we can make those changes later, if appropriate.
[ in subversion/bindings/javahl/ ]
* native/CreateJ.cpp,
native/CreateJ.h
(Status): Update the Status object creator to account for the changes to the
status struct.
* native/StatusCallback.cpp,
native/StatusCallback.h
(callback): Provide the needed pool to doStatus().
(doStatus): Use the pool and context to create the Java Status.
(setWcCtx): New.
* native/SVNClient.cpp
(status): Set the wc_context for the status callback.

author: mturk
msg: Dix DAEMON-146 by applying Sebastian's patch

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2699: camel-netty will reconnect if not connected. Added lazyChannelCreation option.

author: gtully
msg: some maven future proofing - resolve warn about pom property references

author: norman
msg: * Add some reusable SMTPProtocolHandlerChain

* Add Hook interface
